Header: Eva Longoria and Elle Fanning star in floating fashion show on River Seine
Content: Boat traffic on the River Seine came to a standstill to make way for a floating runway featuring movie stars and models, in an extravaganza orchestrated by cosmetics firm L’Oreal to coincide with Paris Fashion Week. Actors Eva Longoria, Elle Fanning and Nikolaj Coster Waldau, and models Thylane Blondeau and Soo Joo Park were among the famous faces marching down the 60-metre floating runway in quirky make-up styles, as crowds gathered on nearby bridges to watch. River traffic in front of Paris’ Orsay Museum stopped for 30 minutes for the event. Left Side Content Middle Content Right Side Content
